uk.co.silentsoftware.ui
Class PreviewFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      uk.co.silentsoftware.ui.PreviewFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PreviewFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Frame to display many preview results This frame has a fixed width and height that is 3 Spectrum images across by 5 in height to cater for all 15 dither strategies currently available.

See Also:
Serialized Form

PreviewFrame

public PreviewFrame()
Dither preview frame that locks the resize to the fixed dimensions required for all 15 dithers

Method Detail

repaintImage

public static void repaintImage()
Repaint method to allow repainting while threads are still processing the results to draw on this dialog

getPoint

public static java.awt.Point getPoint()
Retrieves the next point on the dither preview image that should be drawn on by the preview controller. Not synchronized since this is only called by the one controlling thread.

Returns:

reset

public static void reset()
Resets the current point to display at on the panel as provided by getPoint() to 0,0

getPreviewImage

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getPreviewImage()
Retrieves the dither preview image to draw on

Returns:
